name: Void (itch) (Rosden Shadow)
description:
A short lonely experience about feeling the vast nothingness through being swallowed by ever expanding darkness while tiny lights orbit you

 

Takes around 5 minutes to play.

 

(You will get the best experience if you try to play in complete darkness (or as close as you can get to it))

(An older version that goes on forever: https://rosden2.itch.io/void)
